root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 11-1-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable11.1 By 2030, ensure universal access to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services, and improve slum areas11.1.1. Cost for building permit (% of GDP / head)it is the cost for a building permit expressed as a percentage of the GDP per capitaR Ratio between the cost of building permits and per capita GDP, expressed as a percentageNot available
